EmailTemplate.description: For those that bought the Dummies book
EmailTemplate.name: Dummies book-bought
EmailTemplate.subject: Yodle - Thank you for your purchase
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your reading our book, “Local Online Advertising for Dummies” and for downloading the bonus chapter. We hope you enjoy it and will help you grow your business.
If you are interested in learning more about how Yodle can help you with your local online advertising campaign, feel free to call 877-276-5104 or respond to this email to schedule an appointment with one of our online specialists. You’ll get a $100 credit if you mention dummies!
Yodle info@yodle.com
Privacy Policy | Terms of Use
Yodle Inc. Headquarters 50 West 23rd Street, 4th Floor, NY, NY 10010
